verbose_text: Notably, downregulation of the C. elegans mTOR homolog let-363, which lowers protein synthesis rates and prolongs lifespan, increased eIF4E localization to PBs in edc-3 mutants during adulthood (XREF_FIG G).
evidence: mTOR homolog let-363, which lowers protein synthesis rates and prolongs lifespan              , increased eIF4E
